entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023
